name: @4mbl/tsconfig
description: TypeScript configuration templates for various environments.
author: 4mbl

scripts.release: node ./scripts/get-version.js && npm install && npm run prep-release && npm publish && git add . && git commit $(npm run get-version) && git push
scripts.release:beta: node ./scripts/get-version.js && npm install && npm run prep-release && npm publish --tag beta && git add . && git commit $(npm run get-version) && git push
